headline: Formo raises $50M to scale precision-fermented cheese production.
summary: German startup Formo secured $50M to expand its production of animal-free cheese made via precision fermentation.

headline: MycoWorks partners with major fashion house for mushroom leather garments.
summary: MycoWorks announced a collaboration with a leading fashion brand to create apparel using their Reishi mushroom leather.

headline: Solar Foods secures regulatory approval for Solein protein in Singapore.
summary: Solar Foods' Solein, a protein made from CO2, received regulatory clearance in Singapore, paving the way for commercialization.

headline: Algiknit raises seed funding to scale seaweed-based yarn production.
summary: Algiknit obtained seed funding to expand production of its biodegradable yarn made from seaweed, offering a plastic alternative.

headline: Perfect Day launches animal-free whey protein ice cream nationwide.
summary: Perfect Day expanded its reach with a nationwide launch of its ice cream made with precision-fermented whey protein.

headline: Bolt Threads announces new application for Microsilk in automotive interiors.
summary: Bolt Threads is partnering with an automotive manufacturer to incorporate Microsilk, a spider silk alternative, in car interiors.

headline: Change Foods unveils prototype of precision-fermented mozzarella.
summary: Change Foods showcased its first prototype of mozzarella cheese produced through precision fermentation.

headline: Modern Meadow partners with athletic apparel company to develop biofabricated leather.
summary: Modern Meadow is collaborating with an athletic brand to create performance wear using its biofabricated leather material.

headline: Air Protein announces construction of large-scale production facility.
summary: Air Protein commenced building a large-scale production plant for its protein made from air (CO2).

headline: Natural Fiber Welding raises Series C to expand production of Mirum.
summary: Natural Fiber Welding secured Series C funding to scale up the production of Mirum, a plant-based leather alternative.
